item.title: API Versioning in ASP.NET Core
item.description: Versioning is an important aspect of API design and implementation. We want to be able change our service and add new features while still providing a stable API that our users can consume. To that end I recently spent a little time with Microsoft’s aspnet-api-versioning library to learn how it provides an easy way to add different verioning semantics to your API project. These libraries are really easy to get started with and there are a handful of useful samples here.
